001package org.consensusj.bitcoinj.signing;
002
003import org.bitcoinj.base.Address;
004import org.bitcoinj.base.Coin;
005import org.bitcoinj.base.Network;
006import org.bitcoinj.core.TransactionInput;
007import org.bitcoinj.core.TransactionOutPoint;
008import org.bitcoinj.core.TransactionOutput;
009import org.bitcoinj.script.Script;
010import org.bitcoinj.script.ScriptBuilder;
011
012/**
013 * Immutable data for a transaction input.
014 * See also {@link RawTransactionSigningRequest.RawInput} which can hold an incomplete transaction input, like
015 * those sent in the {@code signtransactionwithwallet} JSON-RPC request.
016 */
017public interface TransactionInputData {
018    Coin amount();
019
020    /**
021     * prevOut ScriptPubKey
022     */
023
024    Script script();
025
026    /**
027     * This probably shouldn't be here but is needed for proper operation with bitcoinj
028     * @return A Transaction "outpoint" pointing to the utxo this input will spend.
029     */
030    TransactionOutPoint toOutPoint(Network network);
031
032    Utxo toUtxo();
033
034    /**
035     * Create from a UTXO that paid to an address the intended signer can redeem
036     */
037    static TransactionInputData of(Utxo.Signable utxo, Address address) {
038        return new TransactionInputDataUtxo(utxo.txId(), utxo.index(), utxo.amount(), ScriptBuilder.createOutputScript(address));
039    }
040
041    /**
042     * Create from a UTXO that paid to a script the intended signer can redeem
043     * @param utxo Complete UTXO info
044     * @return input ready for signing
045     */
046    static TransactionInputData of(Utxo.Complete utxo) {
047        return new TransactionInputDataUtxo(utxo.txId(), utxo.index(), utxo.amount(), utxo.scriptPubKey());
048    }
049
050    /**
051     * Create an unsigned transaction input from an unspent transaction output that the signer can redeem
052     * @param out An unspent transaction output
053     * @return transaction input data
054     */
055    static TransactionInputData fromTxOut(TransactionOutput out) {
056        return new TransactionInputDataUtxo(out.getParentTransactionHash(), out.getIndex(), out.getValue(), out.getScriptPubKey());
057    }
058
059    /**
060     * Create an unsigned transaction input from an bitcoinj (unsigned) TransactionInput.
061     * @param input A transaction input (typically/currently unsigned)
062     * @return transaction input data
063     */
064    static TransactionInputData fromTxInput(TransactionInput input) {
065        return new TransactionInputDataUtxo(
066                input.getOutpoint().getHash(),
067                (int) input.getOutpoint().getIndex(),
068                input.getValue(),
069                input.getScriptSig());
070    }
071}
